body:
Look at the dudes whining here. It's almost as if this hentai was made for people who are into weight gain. I agree with he guy below me though. She's hotter fat, especially the last two pages.

If you don't like weight gain hentai, then don't read it. As simple as that. You have literal tags which for the most part, tell you what to expect of a doujin.
She's way too hot in the last 2 pages idk what gays below me are talking about
damn bro, he ruined that fine body. didnt even go for that sweet asshole
Ha found some gold
Literal 10/10 then got fat

1. He a good master. He got moves, he got schemes, he got quality for master. But he still got a room for improve!

2. Mi really ashamed to her as fellow pig/sow/slave can't take care what ur master demand. What a joke! U really make me feel angry for your half asses way to entertain your master! If you really want to get totally dominated to your master, don't do it in half asses! You're not noble! You're just a slave. Or should mi take ur place as his sow, huh? ╮(╯_╰)╭
"Hello? Fat fetish Doujinshi Artist? I would like for your character to go to the gym!"
Uhh.. this went into a weird direction real quick
Was 10/10 until she became fat smh
Christ "feeders" are some of the biggest scums of the earth.  It's a real thing, and reaaalllll fucked up.

10/10 the boobs were amazingly big
8/10, nice
This was some pretty good sauce
Love it, he introduced her to all kinds of restaurants, ends up getting addicted to eating them that she became fat as she ate
THOT EXTERMINATED
turning her from a hot glutton to obedient thicc perverted woman........not a bad idea. S plus
She looked better before but I liked the part where MC was teasing her and in my opinion, this shit's pretty hot so a solid 7/10 for me

*"thicc" girl has fat in her ass, tits, hips, and thighs*
you virgin chucks: "yeah wow she's hot as fuck lemme bust a but"
*"thicc" girl has fat in all those places but ALSO her belly like any natural fucking "thicc" girl would have*
you virgin chucks: "ew fucking gross she's fat as fuck, she's not thicc at all"
Retarded virgins

Literally, only fat that was added was onto her fucking belly. She could've been overweight before, just had a better figure. Y'all virgin retards in the comments are perfectly fucking fine with fat girls until she has a fat belly then it's a no and y'all fucking know it.

Bullitt,
Totally agree with you on this, the girl's just straight up fat now. Thicc girls still gotta have some sex appeal, not just fat. That extra fat has to be added strategically to enhance, not take away from the girl. See anything by ashiomi Masato for what I consider good thicc
Ok so so. Only part is she could have lost the weight and as for the rest, mood killer.
anyone know more like this ?

Hmm I normally like thicc gurls,but there is a range between thicc and being straight up fat.  I felt the author kinda ruined the character, not just in aesthetics either, her being completely mind broken kinda fucked up the older "bad girl" look and vibe that the story started out with.
let all be real thicc just translates to fat lets not praise that shit
wooo weee! shit ending but DAMN the rest though.
Fat is one of those things where big is beautiful ,but all the problems that come with it not as much.
Not the ending i  was expecting but still good
Bifidus is love
Lord Bifidus strikes again. Sadly, there's only one more chapter in book they've been translating these past months.
honestly she looked much better when she wasn't overweight.

this is perfect

Yeah, this isn't doing it for me. She looked better before
I like this doujin but....page 012 looks super bad.
I need MOAR
she did say she wanted to experience something she hadn't before.
Big fan of big women, sadly abuse turns me off. So much wasted potential.

You already know what I'm about to say...
